target.text: Developing Commands Interactively

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To access the new-command-management page directly:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Access the Time Off Request discussion forum, which contains your time-off workflow process.

target.name: Step
target.text: Access the Time Off Request discussion forum, which contains your time-off workflow process.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Tools toolbar item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Administration menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Develop commands interactively, which is located in the same section of the management page that allows you to create workflow processes.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To add the "Request time off " new command:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Access the new-command-management page from either the management menu in the discussion forum or by clicking the Developing commands interactively tab.

target.name: Step
target.text: Access the new-command-management page from either the management menu in the discussion forum or by clicking the Developing commands interactively tab.

target.name: Step
target.text: If there are existing commands, click Add a command on the toolbar (otherwise, skip this step).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the working area of the page, enter the name of the command in the "Command name" text box, and use wording that sounds like a command (a phrase that begins with a verb):

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Add button.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Modifying Elements

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To modify an element:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Access the new-command-management page, if you are not there already, and view your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: Access the new-command-management page, if you are not there already, and view your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Title radio button.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Modify/view button.

target.name: Step
target.text: Enter a new caption for the Title element.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Creating a User List Element

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To create the user list element:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Access the new-command-management page, if you are not there already, and view your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: Access the new-command-management page, if you are not there already, and view your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click User List, in the "Add HTML layout element" section of the new-command tools.

target.name: Step
target.text: Complete the "Add element toÉ" page.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the User list radio button that corresponds to the manger's username.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type "4" in the textbox in between the Move up and Move down buttons.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Move up button.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Test the New Command

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To preview the form:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Access the new-command-management page, if you are not there already, and view your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: Access the new-command-management page, if you are not there already, and view your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Preview tool.

target.name: Step
target.text: Use the windowing or browser commands to close the preview window.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To see the view page of your new command:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: View a folder or entry page in the discussion forum containing your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: View a folder or entry page in the discussion forum containing your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Add toolbar item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Request Time Off menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Fill out the form (specify Bob Jones as your manager), and specify any dates.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Associate the Command with a Workflow

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To associate the workflow with the command:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Access the new-command-management page, if you are not there already, and view your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: Access the new-command-management page, if you are not there already, and view your new command.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Associate a workflow process with this command link in the "Edit the command" section of the new-command tools.

target.name: Step
target.text: Use the drop-down menu to select Time Off Request.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To update the workflow process to work with the new command:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Access the workflow-management page, and view the Time Off Request workflow process.

target.name: Step
target.text: Access the workflow-management page, and view the Time Off Request workflow process.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Set access rights for all states link in the "Edit the whole workflow" set of workflow tools.

target.name: Step
target.text: Replace every instance of "Managers (managers) Group" with the following:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Show whole workflow tool.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Submit oval in the flowchart in the working area of the page.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Add or delete notifications in the "Edit the current state" set of workflow tools.

target.name: Step
target.text: Alter the notification for the Submit state, so that the notification goes only to "Request Time Off: Your manager's name."

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Disable Extra Commands

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To disable default commands:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: View the management menu of the discussion forum in which you created the new command.If you are currently viewing the new-command-management page, click Close in the toolbar.

target.name: Step
target.text: View the management menu of the discussion forum in which you created the new command.If you are currently viewing the new-command-management page, click Close in the toolbar.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Modify standard menu commands, located in the same section that allows you to create interactive new commands and workflow processes.

target.name: Step
target.text: Deselect all the command options from both the Add and Attach menus, but leave the Reply command selected.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Apply.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Close.

target.name: Step
target.text: To return to the forum, click Close.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Modify column layout.

target.name: Step
target.text: Alter the form as follows:
